items.title: Notice: Interoperable Demand Side Response programme: successful projects
items.summary: Successful projects supporting the development and demonstration of energy smart appliances for the delivery of the Interoperable Demand Side Response programme.

items.title: Notice: Biomass Feedstocks Innovation Programme: successful projects
items.summary: £36 million in funding for projects to support innovation in the production of sustainable domestic biomass.

items.title: Transparency data: UKAEA prompt payment return data from 2025 to 2026
items.summary: Prompt payment return data for the UK Atomic Energy Authority, showing invoices paid within 5 and 30 days of receipt from 2025 to 2026.

items.title: Notice: Red Diesel Replacement competition: successful projects
items.summary: Grant funding for projects to develop and demonstrate innovative low carbon technologies for use as alternatives to red diesel on construction, mining and quarrying sites.

items.title: Decision: Helios Renewable Energy Project: decision on an application for development consent under the Planning Act 2008
items.summary: Decision on an application for a solar farm in North Yorkshire under the Planning Act 2008.

items.title: Guidance: Capture Redress Scheme: independent panel and panel chair privacy notice
items.summary: How the Capture Redress Scheme independent panel and the panel chair  will process your personal data.

items.title: Industrial Strategy Advisory Council launches landmark partnership to accelerate UK innovation and growth
items.summary: The Industrial Strategy Advisory Council (ISAC) has partnered with the University of Manchester to access its research and expertise and drive forward recommendations for the Government’s Industrial Strategy.

items.title: Hydrogen Economic Regulatory Framework: developing an effective framework for pipeline networks
items.summary: We’re seeking views on the economic regulatory market framework for 100% hydrogen pipeline networks, established under the Gas Act 1986.

items.title: Transparency data: DESNZ register of board members’ interests, 2025 to 2026
items.summary: A register of the private interests declared by DESNZ board members.

items.title: Guidance: Overseas business risk for Belgium
items.summary: Information on key security and political risks which UK businesses may face when operating in Belgium.

items.title: Scheme supporting UK artists begins new funding round
items.summary: Scheme supporting BRIT and Mercury Prize-winning artists begins new funding round

items.title: Transparency data: Women on boards: executive search firms signed up to the code of conduct
items.summary: A list of executive search firms signed up to the voluntary code of conduct to address gender diversity on corporate boards.

items.title: Mercedes electric vehicle investment to create over 150 British Jobs
items.summary: Over 150 jobs will be created across Northamptonshire and Oxfordshire through a new UK-Germany electric vehicle technology project led by Mercedes.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Building materials and components statistics: November 2025
items.summary: Statistics and analysis on the construction sector for November 2025.

items.title: Transparency data: DESNZ major projects: appointment letters for Senior Responsible Owners (SROs)
items.summary: Department for Energy Security and Net Zero (DESNZ) appointment letters for Government Major Projects Portfolio (GMPP) Senior Responsible Owners (SROs).

items.title: Policy paper: Energising Britain: Your voice in our Clean Energy Superpower Mission
items.summary: Find out how the government is helping people access the benefits of climate and nature action.

items.title: Research: Climate Science Research Programme (CSRP) evaluation: summary report
items.summary: A summary report evaluating the Climate Science Research Programme (CSRP).

items.title: Capacity Market: proposals to integrate low carbon technologies and enhance delivery assurance ahead of Prequalification 2026
items.summary: We are seeking views on proposed changes to the Capacity Market (CM) for Prequalification 2026.

items.title: Common biomass sustainability framework
items.summary: We're seeking views on a common biomass sustainability framework to strengthen existing biomass criteria and ensure greater consistency across sectors.

items.title: Technology and energy ministers discuss grid reform at AI Energy Council meeting
items.summary: The latest meeting of the AI Energy Council - the final round of discussions for 2025 - has taken place in London.

items.title: Notice: Apply for the Heat Network Efficiency Scheme (HNES): Round 11
items.summary: The Heat Network Efficiency Scheme supports performance improvements to existing district heating or communal heating projects.

items.title: Package travel legislation: consultation on proposed amendments
items.summary: The government is consulting on proposed changes to the 2018 Package Travel and Linked Travel Arrangements Regulations (2018 PTRs).

items.title: Form: Capture Redress Scheme: application form
items.summary: Complete this form to apply for financial redress for financial losses and harm caused by the Post Office Capture software.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Weekly road fuel prices
items.summary: Road fuel price statistics providing average UK retail 'pump' prices on a weekly basis.

items.title: Research: Evaluation of the Green Heat Network Fund (GHNF) scheme
items.summary: Findings from evaluation research into the administration, delivery and impacts of the Green Heat Network Fund transition scheme and main scheme.

items.title: Research: Heat Network Efficiency Scheme (HNES) evaluation
items.summary: Findings from the interim evaluations into the administration, delivery and impacts of the Heat Network Efficiency Scheme (HNES).

items.title: UK-USA Mutual Recognition Agreement on marine equipment
items.summary: Documents relating to the UK-USA Mutual Recognition Agreement (MRA) on marine equipment.

items.title: Oil and gas: environmental submissions and determinations
items.summary: Interested parties can review records of applications and statements submitted to OPRED as required by environmental regulations.

items.title: Oil and gas: offshore environmental legislation
items.summary: Environmental regulations and guidance on offshore oil and gas exploration and production offshore gas unloading and storage and offshore carbon dioxide storage activities

items.title: Smart Secure Electricity Systems (SSES) Programme: first phase energy smart appliances regulations
items.summary: We're seeking feedback on the SSES Programme’s draft Phase 1 energy smart appliances regulations and impact assessment.

items.title: Policy paper: Industrial Strategy
items.summary: Strategy document setting out a new economic approach to backing the UK’s strengths, with ambitious plans for 8 high-growth sectors.

items.title: Guidance: Music Export Growth Scheme (MEGS) privacy notice
items.summary: This privacy notice confirms how the Department for Business and Trade (DBT) collects and uses personal data from applications submitted under the scheme.

items.title: Make Work Pay: leave for bereavement including pregnancy loss
items.summary: We are seeking views on the details of a new entitlement to bereavement leave, including for pregnancy loss before 24 weeks.

items.title: Draft amendment to the Competition Act 1998 (Public Transport Ticketing Schemes Block Exemption) Order 2001
items.summary: This consultation seeks feedback on the legal drafting of an Order amending the Competition Act 1998 (Public Transport Ticketing Schemes Block Exemption) Order 2001.

items.title: Notice: Notice to exporters 2025/31: UK exporter pays compound settlement for breaches of export controls
items.summary: HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) settlement from UK exporter for breaches relating to the UK export controls.

items.title: Landmark UK-US pharmaceuticals deal to safeguard medicines access and drive vital investment for UK patients and businesses
items.summary: Milestone deal secures UK’s medicines access for patients, with a wide range of groundbreaking new treatments to reach NHS front-line quicker.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notice: definitive anti-dumping duty on certain excavators originating from China
items.summary: The Secretary of State for Business and Trade is applying a definitive anti-dumping duty on certain excavators originating from China.

items.title: Smart Data Challenge Prize selects Moverly’s digital property pack as winner
items.summary: A Smart Data prototype that generates “Digital Sale Ready Packs” to make it easier to buy and sell a home has been named the winner of the Smart Data Challenge Prize by the Department for Business and Trade.

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods, 2022
items.summary: 2022 statistics on the UK’s utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under PTAs, including trade in goods between Great Britain and the EU under the TCA.

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods, 2021
items.summary: 2021 statistics on the UK’s utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under PTAs, including trade in goods between Great Britain and the EU under the TCA.
